verbose_text: Stimulation of NOD1 or NOD2 results in the activation of the adaptor protein receptor interacting protein 2 (RIP2; also called RICK) which promotes the activation of NF-kappaB and MAPKs pathway leading to transcription of numerous genes involved in inflammation and host defense.
evidence: receptor-interacting protein 2 (RIP2; also called RICK) which promotes the activation of NF-kappaB and MAPKs
